text: Fighting back. Renee Zellweger ’ s team is denouncing allegations that she had inappropriate encounters with Harvey Weinstein in order to escalate her career. The claims came to light in a class - action lawsuit that six unnamed women recently filed against Weinstein, alleging that Zellweger, 48, and Charlize Theron both ascended in their professional endeavors by performing “ sexual favors ” for Weinstien, 65. “ If Harvey said that, he ’ s full of shit, ” a rep for the Bridget Jones actress, who has starred in several films produced by the former studio exec, including Cold Mountain which she won an Oscar for in 2004, told Us Weekly in a statement on Wednesday, December 7. Weinstein responded to the claims in a statement to Us on Monday, December 11
